definition: a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: A yardstick slides out of his pants.
sentences.chinese: 从他的裤子里掉出来了一把尺子。

sentences.english: Pencil, ruler, rubber, Prometric ID should be ready.
sentences.chinese: 铅笔，尺子，橡皮考试号都应该准备好用英语谢谢。

sentences.english: There is a pen, two rulers and three pencils in my pencil-box.
sentences.chinese: 我的铅笔盒里有一支钢笔，两把尺子和三支铅笔。

sentences.english: He thwacked the desk with a ruler.
In my day, we had ruler fights.
sentences.chinese: 在我上学的那会儿，我们也有尺子大战呢。
苏海手里的尺子比迈克的长。

sentences.english: Wooden ruler with a split that functions as a place to rest your pencil.
sentences.chinese: 木制尺子中间有一个缝隙可以让你放铅笔。

sentences.english: Su Hai's ruler is longer than mine.
sentences.chinese: 苏海受里的尺子比我的长。

sentences.english: Unique and innovative rulers that will help you get accurate measurements.
sentences.chinese: 独特而又创新的尺子将帮助你获得准确的测量数据。

sentences.english: Place a ruler next to items like vases when taking photographs.
sentences.chinese: 拍照的时候，在花瓶之类的物品旁边放一把尺子。

sentences.english: My ruler is orange and very long.
sentences.chinese: 我的尺子是橘色的，它很长。

sentences.english: We use it to keep pencils, rulers , erasers and so on.
sentences.chinese: 我们用它保存铅笔，尺子，橡皮等。

sentences.english: There are many rulers in the pencil case.
The chalk holder can be moved up and down the ruler.
sentences.chinese: 小瓶子可以在尺子上下移动。

sentences.english: I went into a stationer's to buy a ruler.
sentences.chinese: 我走进文具店去买一把尺子。

sentences.english: This ruler is three times as long as that one.
sentences.chinese: 这把尺子是那把的三倍长。

definition: set square (tool to measure right angles)
